channel.title: How do i change my home
channel.description: hi i own a 317 server and right now my home is lumbrige i want to change it to fally i got the cordinates but i dont know what text file i go in to change it in myemotes tab where the emotes are suppose to be i got instead of emotes stuff like home jad pking and other thing i want to know what file i go in to change these and to change the cordinates

item.title: How do i change my home
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

[quote=“mmaKush, post:4, topic:321197”][quote author=pkerjosh link=topic=417647.msg3070310#msg3070310 date=1261501132]
hi i own a 317 server and right now my home is lumbrige i want to change it to fally i got the cordinates but i dont know what text file i go in to change it in myemotes tab where the emotes are suppose to be i got instead of emotes stuff like home jad pking and other thing i want to know what file i go in to change these and to change the cordinates
[/quote]
More than likely you have a server with a textHandler class… Just open that file up and that’s where, now I’m not making any guarantees, but I’m pretty sure that’s where the emote tab text would be, such as your “home, jad, pking”, etc…[/quote]

client class to change the coords as thats where everything is piled into on old silab servers.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i change my home

item.title: How do i change my home
item.dc:creator: @mmaKush mmaKush
item.description:
@mmaKush wrote:

pkerjosh:

hi i own a 317 server and right now my home is lumbrige i want to change it to fally i got the cordinates but i dont know what text file i go in to change it in myemotes tab where the emotes are suppose to be i got instead of emotes stuff like home jad pking and other thing i want to know what file i go in to change these and to change the cordinates

More than likely you have a server with a textHandler class… Just open that file up and that’s where, now I’m not making any guarantees, but I’m pretty sure that’s where the emote tab text would be, such as your “home, jad, pking”, etc…

And to change where the emotes teleport you to you either have to look in your client class file or if you have a clickingMost, or clickingButtons file, it’ll be located in there as a packet (case).

Read full topic

when i click home it teles me to lumbride castle i want it so when i click it it will teleport me to fallador
